name: Referential
description: The fastest API to access countries, states, cities, continents, dial and zip codes in up to 20 languages. A collection of data APIs to support forms, signups, search and lookup. Our endpoints are optimized for speed and size. Our data is regularly maintained and comes from International Standardization bodies, the United Nations, government surveys and GIS datasets. We do not scrape WikiPedia etc

api_methods.name: Languages
api_methods.description: List the world's languages translated into 20 languages

parameters.name: lang_3
parameters.description: Filter by 3 letter ISO language code

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Select fields to return in result [flag,iso_a2,lang_3,lang]

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Returns a language translated into lang language

utterances.utterance: Can you list all the world's languages translated into Spanish?
Show me the languages spoken in France with their 3 letter ISO codes.
I want to see the language names translated into German.
List the language with the 3 letter ISO code 'eng' translated into French.
Provide the languages spoken in Japan with their flags and ISO codes.
Show me all languages translated into Chinese.
Get the language details for the 3 letter ISO code 'spa' in English.
List languages spoken in Brazil with their names translated into Portuguese.
Show me the languages spoken in Canada with their flags and names in English.
Provide the language translated into Italian for the 3 letter ISO code 'rus'.
